programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: Dad Got Grounded
programme.desc: Paul is a great pilot, but after breaking his promise to retire early to care for their son, his wife leaves him. Faced with having to take care of their son and his two other children by himself, Paul must show that he is a good father to win her back.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
programme.desc: In Tuscany, Polish Nobel Prize winner Maria's stable family life begins to erode as her relationship with a young immigrant develops against a backdrop of terrorism and eroding democracy.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: Copy Cat
programme.desc: A rookie and veteran detective work together on the case of a murdered young journalist. They quickly arrest a prime suspect who seems all but surely the killer. Yet, the ease of everything unsettles them – something isn’t right but what exactly?

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: Mountain Woman
programme.desc: When famine overruns a small Japanese village, Rin must leave the village in order to protect her father accused of theft. Rin heads deep into Mt. Hayachin, and crosses the forbidden mountain god's shrine, where the goddess of thieves is said to dwell.

programme.title: Paralympian
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories. The one leg athlete sinks into a deep depression, until one day he is offered to try his luck at the Paralympic games.

programme.title: Keep Calm And Curry On
programme.desc: When Beatles fans Charlotte and Erik decided to exchange with one Sandy McCartney from London, they were in for a shock when Sandy turned out to be an Indian boy. They try to get rid of the nerdy know-it-all, but Sandy might just be a blessing in disguise.

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Leòn enlist the help of Roberta’s non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Roberta’s eccentric family for the scheme to work.

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg
programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

programme.title: SAF
programme.desc: Desperate, Kamil takes a low wage job in Istanbul's urbanization project. In so doing, he displaces a Syrian refugee and partakes in his neighborhood’s destruction, while also needing to pay for the required permits. One day, Kamil suddenly disappears.

programme.title: Lahore Bhojnalay
programme.desc: A man on a mission right in the heart of enemy lines, gets help from a stranger, who sees right through his disguise.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: Copy Cat
programme.desc: A rookie and veteran detective work together on the case of a murdered young journalist. They quickly arrest a prime suspect who seems all but surely the killer. Yet, the ease of everything unsettles them – something isn’t right but what exactly?

programme.title: Mountain Woman
programme.desc: When famine overruns a small Japanese village, Rin must leave the village in order to protect her father accused of theft. Rin heads deep into Mt. Hayachin, and crosses the forbidden mountain god's shrine, where the goddess of thieves is said to dwell.

programme.title: Keep Calm And Curry On
programme.desc: When Beatles fans Charlotte and Erik decided to exchange with one Sandy McCartney from London, they were in for a shock when Sandy turned out to be an Indian boy. They try to get rid of the nerdy know-it-all, but Sandy might just be a blessing in disguise.

programme.title: SAF
programme.desc: Desperate, Kamil takes a low wage job in Istanbul's urbanization project. In so doing, he displaces a Syrian refugee and partakes in his neighborhood’s destruction, while also needing to pay for the required permits. One day, Kamil suddenly disappears.

programme.title: Light Years (2021)
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their father’s old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg
programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Run Woman Run
programme.desc: When a steady diet of donuts, pizza, cake and cigarettes lands Beck in a diabetic coma, she receives a ghostly life coach in the form of legendary marathon hero Tom Longboat who helps her train for the run of her life.

programme.title: Lahore Bhojnalay
programme.desc: A man on a mission right in the heart of enemy lines, gets help from a stranger, who sees right through his disguise.

programme.title: Ricky
programme.desc: When Katie, an ordinary woman, meets Paco, an ordinary man, something magical and miraculous happens: a love story. From this union will be born an extraordinary baby: Ricky.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Woman On The Train
programme.desc: The reveal of the mysterious, new Chief Inspector receives a lukewarm welcome while the unexpected death of the Commissioner sends shockwaves through the Kiel police. With each new lead, it is clear that the situation may be more complex than it seems.

programme.title: Margherita Hack - The Lady Of The Stars
programme.desc: The intimate and emotional biography of Italian astrophysicist Margherita Hack, from an independent and curious child to the first female director of the Trieste Astronomical Observatory.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.
